contents.name: C
contents.description: General-purpose programming language developed primarily by Dennis MacAlistair Ritchie at AT&T Bell Labs.
contents.features:
Languages frequently used in the development of embedded software
Often used to learn the basics of programming at university
Exploded into prominence when UNIX, originally written in assembly, was rewritten in C
contents.pros: Fast execution speed due to translation into native machine language
contents.cons: High degree of difficulty e.g. pointer management

contents.name: Python
contents.description: The idea is to make it as easy as possible to write readable, yet efficient code: Python body provides only the minimum functionality that users always need, and they download and use library as required.
contents.features:
41.3% of engineers developing data analysis systems use Python
70.0% use it for AI systems
Proven track record in web and desktop applications
contents.pros:
Grammar is simple and easy to read
Extensive practical libraries
contents.cons:
As an interpreted and dynamically typed language, it is slower than other languages
Therefore, it is difficult to use in critical systems such as mission-critical systems

contents.name: PHP
contents.description: An open source general-purpose programming language developed on a community basis by "The PHP Group" in 1995.
contents.features:
Server-side languages
PHP originated as a tool for generating dynamic web pages
contents.cons: Only expected to be used in the creation of websites

contents.name: TypeScript
contents.description: 2012, developed and maintained by Microsoft as a free and open source programming language.
contents.features:
A strict superset of Javascript with optional static typing and class-based object orientation.
Created by Microsoft to compensate for the shortcomings of large-scale application development in JavaScript.
contents.pros:
Type declarations can increase development efficiency and safety
JavaScript can be generated for older browsers
contents.cons: The conversion uses such as tsc, babel or webpack, so it needs to be set up
